caption.center: STATE OF LOUISIANA v. CHARLES WAYNE JOHNSON.

opinion.posture: In re Charles Wayne Johnson, applying for writs of certiorari, prohibition, mandamus and a stay order. Parish of Bienville. Nos. 18080 and 18081.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Denied. This case has been tried and submitted to a jury. We will not interrupt the proceedings to review alleged pre-trial and trial errors, since defendant has an adequate remedy by appeal in the event of conviction.West Page 188
